template.name: kconfigmap
template.value: apiVersion: v1 kind: ConfigMap metadata: name: $NAME$ data: $KEY$: "$VALUE$"

template.name: kdeployment
template.value: apiVersion: apps/v1 kind: Deployment metadata: name: $NAME$ labels: app: $NAME$ spec: replicas: 1 selector: matchLabels: app: $NAME$ template: metadata: name: $NAME$ labels: app: $NAME$ spec: containers: - name: $NAME$ image: $IMAGE$ imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent restartPolicy: Always

template.name: kpod
template.value: apiVersion: v1 kind: Pod metadata: name: $NAME$ labels: app: $NAME$ spec: containers: - name: $NAME$ image: $IMAGE$ imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent restartPolicy: Always

template.name: kservice
template.value: apiVersion: v1 kind: Service metadata: name: $NAME$ spec: selector: app: $NAME$ ports: - protocol: TCP port: $PORT$ targetPort: $TARGET_PORT$ type: NodePort

template.name: kcronjob
template.value: apiVersion: batch/v1 kind: CronJob metadata: name: $NAME$ spec: schedule: "* * * * *" # Run every minute jobTemplate: spec: template: spec: containers: - name: $NAME$ image: busybox:latest imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent command: - /bin/sh - -c - date; echo Hello! restartPolicy: OnFailure

template.name: kingress
template.value: apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1 kind: Ingress metadata: name: $NAME$ annotations: nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: / spec: ingressClassName: nginx rules: - http: paths: - path: /api pathType: Prefix backend: service: name: $SERVICE_NAME$ port: number: 80
